line_text: All of a sudden you're the shoulder to cry on? Did you at least tell her about your little role in that whole situation?
With a little jazz.
... we wouldn't have had our little accident.
Little black party dresses?
Git along little dowgie and call me back.
You mustn't worry about your little charge. She is in safe hands.
I expected to find this little room overcrowded with a theater full of people at your feet...
We all come into this world with our little egos equipped with individual horns. If we don't blow them - who will?
That'll be a nice little holiday treat.
I don't know about you guys but I'm getting a little buzz off this.
Little Nicky.
Can't you see? She just wanted her little girl back.
The drowning woman. Anne... But it was too late. Her little girl was already gone.
Look -- we got in a little trouble -- they rudely took our helicopter for MedEvac work on this -- uh Operation Brute Force -- They just brought it back this morning.
We're going into battle little one. Find a woman to take care of it.
Hey remember? You don't need my help Madmartigan. Little rabbit trap like this? Come on! I could open it for you but I wouldn't wanna insult you!
Because you looked like a nice guy and I was a little scared. And I sure couldda used a nice guy about that time so I spilled my popcorn on you.
Oooooh you look so cute in your little cowboy outfit. How old were you then?
Oh you look so cute as little Elvis.
Well I wouldn't go so far as to call him nice but he's treated me pretty decent. But I've only been there about four days. He got a little rough with Arlene the other day.
